name: Learn Python 3
description: Learn the basics of Python 3, one of the most powerful, versatile, and in-demand programming languages today.

name: Python Programiz
description: This course covers all the fundamental concepts of Python.

name: 100 days of Python
description: A 100 days of code challenge to learn python from basics to advanced.

name: Python Tutorial
description: Learn Python through this interactive Python tutorial and exercises. You also receive a certificate if you pass them.

name: Real Python Tutorial
description: Learn Web development using Python, Data Science, Machine learning through well explained projects.

name: Complete Python Tutorial
description: Live examples will help you learn Python. This tutorial covers file handling, various modules, Matplotlib, machine learning, MongoDB, and MySQL.
